contract allows accounts with the `EMERGENCY_ROLE` to propose actions on allowlisted target contracts. These actions can only be executed after a specified timelock period has passed, providing a window for review and response. It is upgradeable.","errors":{"EC_InvalidEmergencyLevel(uint8)":[{"details":"Thrown when setting an invalid emergency level (e.g., > 3).","params":{"level":"The invalid level rrors.sol":{"keccak256":"0x17cd9c210f99c21c713da89243fff0ce87996412879bf286b821887a9a81df40","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0de62d64c4f0c7e6728306d2effb0610daa4d0ddf104b9f1c6dbd3434e1e9a5d","dweb:/ipfs/QmQmV1eqBpVKVH35YqZ8B7NPoYSgdtfBAx4AvGAcvMHTiQ"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/proxy/utils/Initializable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x89be10e757d242e9b18d5a32c9fbe2019f6d63052bbe46397a430a1d60d7f794","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f103ee2e4aecd37aac6ceefe670709cdd7613dee25fa2d4d9feaf7fc0aaa155e","dweb:/ipfs/QmRiNZLoJk5k3HPMYGPGjZFd2ke1ZxjhJZkM45Ec9GH9hv"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/security/ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2025ccf05f6f1f2fd4e078e552836f525a1864e3854ed555047cd732320ab29b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d27f4b23c2dee42394aebaf42bf238285230f472dfd3282a39c3f000ec28214f","dweb:/ipfs/QmQa3DnvccwdWJeWrjgXPnFMTWbzWQWR39hVqC7eEwo2PC"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/AddressUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9c80f545915582e63fe206c6ce27cbe85a86fc10b9cd2a0e8c9488fb7c2ee422","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://310136ad60820af4177a11a61d77a3686faf5fca4942b600e08fc940db38396b","dweb:/ipfs/QmbCzMNSTL7Zi7M4UCSqBrkHtp4jjxUnGbkneCZKdR1qeq"]}},"version":1}

params.actionId: The ID of the action to cancel.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the cancellation was successful.

constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

executeEmergencyAction(bytes32).details: Performs checks to ensure the action is valid, executable, and still allowed. It then performs a low-level call to the target contract.

params.actionId: The ID of the action to execute.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the execution was successful.

returns.data: The calldata of the proposed call.
returns.target: The address of the target contract.

returns.cancelled: True if the action has been cancelled.
returns.executed: True if the action has been executed.
returns.timeRemaining: The time in seconds remaining until the action can be executed.

returns.actionIds: An array of all action IDs.

initialize(address,uint256).details: Sets the AccessControl contract and the initial timelock duration. Can only be called once.

params.accessControlAddress: The address of the AccessControl contract.
params.initialTimelockDuration: The initial timelock duration in seconds.

returns.allowed: True if the selector is allowed.
True if the target is allowed.

proposeEmergencyAction(uint8,address,byt.details: The target contract and function selector must both be on the allowlist.

params.data: The calldata for the function to be executed on the target.
params.emergencyLevel: The emergency level associated with this action.
params.target: The address of the contract to call.

returns.actionId: A unique ID for the proposed action.

params.allowed: True to allow, false to disallow.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.allowed: True to allow, false to disallow.
params.target: The address of the target contract.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.newDuration: The new timelock duration in seconds.

returns.success: A boolean indicating if the update was successful.

MAX_TIMELOCK_DURATION().notice: The maximum allowed duration for the timelock.

MIN_TIMELOCK_DURATION().notice: The minimum allowed duration for the timelock.

accessControl().notice: The contract that controls roles and permissions.

allActionIds(uint256).notice: An array of all proposed action IDs for enumeration.

allowedFunctionSelectors(bytes4).notice: A mapping of function selectors that are approved to be called via timelocked actions.

allowedTargets(address).notice: A mapping of contract addresses that are approved targets for timelocked actions.

cancelEmergencyAction(bytes32).notice: Cancels a previously proposed emergency action.

emergencyActions(bytes32).notice: A mapping from a unique action ID to its corresponding EmergencyAction struct.

executeEmergencyAction(bytes32).notice: Executes a proposed emergency action after the timelock period has passed.

getActionDetails(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the full details of a proposed action.

getActionStatus(bytes32).notice: Retrieves the current status of a proposed action.

getAllActionIds().notice: Returns an array of all proposed action IDs.

isFunctionSelectorAllowed(bytes4).notice: Checks if a function selector is on the allowlist.

isTargetAllowed(address).notice: Checks if a target contract address is on the allowlist.

proposeEmergencyAction(uint8,address,byt.notice: Proposes a new emergency action to be executed after a timelock.

setAllowedFunctionSelector(bytes4,bool).notice: Adds or removes a function selector from the list of allowed functions for emergency actions.

setAllowedTarget(address,bool).notice: Adds or removes a contract address from the list of allowed targets for emergency actions.

timelockDuration().notice: The duration in seconds that must pass after a proposal before it can be executed.

updateTimelockDuration(uint256).notice: Updates the timelock duration for all future proposals.
